creator: TransUnion CIBIL
descriptionHtml:
Stay connected to your credit profile with your CIBIL Score and Report, anytime, anywhere!
Your CIBIL Score and Report provides you with a 360-degree comprehensive view of your credit profile to help you stay loan-ready. And while you have accessed your CIBIL dashboard on your mobile phone or computer, this mobile app allows you to stay connected to your credit profile, even on the go.
MONITORING YOUR CREDIT PROFILE JUST GOT EASIER.
Get access to your credit profile at your fingertips and stay connected to your personal credit information, loans and accounts, credit exposure and more, with this mobile app.
Equipped with a refreshing look and feel, the TransUnion CIBIL mobile app allows you to:
• Log in to your mobile’s CIBIL Dashboard with the same username and password that you use on your web application.
• Get one free CIBIL Score and Report, available once a year.
• With your current active subscription you can avail of a host of features that your mobile app comes equipped with:
• Unlimited access and daily refreshes to your CIBIL Score and Report
• CIBIL Score Simulator to evaluate various what-if scenarios and see how different actions can impact your current score
• CIBIL Alerts to get notifications for all the key changes in your credit profile
• Pre-approved loan and credit card offers tailored just for you based on your CIBIL Score
• Monitor your credit profile with a seamless snapshot of all enquiries and active loan accounts or credit cards
• Learn more about your CIBIL Score and Report, and its role in getting you access to credit
Download the app today!
About TransUnion CIBIL – Consumer Interactive
Consumer Interactive is the direct-to-consumer division of TransUnion CIBIL, India’s largest credit information company with one of the country’s most comprehensive collections of consumer information. Our mission is to help Indian consumers access and understand the opportunities that lead to a higher quality of life by providing them with means to appreciate and manage their credit. This is achieved through a confluence of data and internet-based tools that provide consumers the most accessible, accurate credit information and promote financial literacy, inclusion and protection. We believe in the power of information to help individuals make better and smarter decisions so they can achieve their personal financial goals while contributing to the development of a stronger economy.

We call this Information for Good.
www.cibil.com

descriptionHtml:
Stay connected to your credit profile with your CIBIL Score and Report, anytime, anywhere!

Your CIBIL Score and Report provides you with a 360-degree comprehensive view of your credit profile to help you stay loan-ready. And while you have accessed your CIBIL dashboard on your mobile phone or computer, this mobile app allows you to stay connected to your credit profile, even on the go.

• Our Subscription services seamlessly enable you to avail CIBIL Score and Report along with a host of features that your mobile app comes equipped with:
• Unlimited access and daily refreshes to your CIBIL Score and Report
• CIBIL Score Simulator to evaluate various what-if scenarios and see how different actions can impact your current score
• CIBIL Alerts to get notifications for all the key changes in your credit profile
• Monitor your credit profile with a seamless snapshot of all enquiries and active loan accounts or credit cards
• Learn more about your CIBIL Score and Report, and its role in getting you access to credit

Personalized loan offers matched to your needs only at CIBIL Marketplace.
• We are a platform facilitating the loan transactions between the borrowers and the Banks/NBFCs.
• Consumers can choose from a wide range of personalized Loans & Credit Card offers from India’s top Banks (HDFC Ltd, ICICI Bank, etc.), NBFCs (Bajaj Finance Ltd, Bajaj Housing Finance Ltd, Homefirst Finance Company Ltd, Aditya Birla Finance Limited, etc.) and Fintech lenders (LendingKart, FlexiLoans, etc.)
• Period for repayment: 3 to 90 months
• Annual Percentage Rate (APR) - (Interest Rate): 3% to 48%
• Processing Fee: 0.5% to 10% of loan amount charged by the lenders

Please Note:
• All loans are only available to Indian citizens within the territory of India
• Final loan approval is subject to the policy of the lender

Example:
• For loan amount of INR 100,000
• Tenure: 12 months
• Processing fee: 2% & interest 15%

Representative Calculation:
• For a loan amount of INR 100,000
• Processing fee is 2% amounting to INR 2,000.
• Actual loan disbursed will be INR 98,000 (Processing fee is deducted from the loan amount and disbursed)
• Total interest payable for 12 months (15%) is: INR 8,310.
• Total amount payable: INR 108,310

Download the app today!

About TransUnion CIBIL – Consumer Interactive
Consumer Interactive is the direct-to-consumer division of TransUnion CIBIL, India’s largest credit information company with one of the country’s most comprehensive collections of consumer information. Our mission is to help Indian consumers access and understand the opportunities that lead to a higher quality of life by providing them with means to appreciate and manage their credit. This is achieved through a confluence of data and internet-based tools that provide consumers the most accessible, accurate credit information and promote financial literacy, inclusion and protection. We believe in the power of information to help individuals make better and smarter decisions so they can achieve their personal financial goals while contributing to the development of a stronger economy.

We call this Information for Good.

descriptionHtml:
Stay connected to your credit profile with your CIBIL Score and Report, anytime, anywhere!

Your CIBIL Score and Report provides you with a 360-degree comprehensive view of your credit profile to help you stay loan-ready. And while you have accessed your CIBIL dashboard on your mobile phone or computer, this mobile app allows you to stay connected to your credit profile, even on the go.

MONITORING YOUR CREDIT PROFILE JUST GOT EASIER.
Get access to your credit profile at your fingertips and stay connected to your personal credit information, loans and accounts, credit exposure and more, with this mobile app.

Equipped with a refreshing look and feel, the TransUnion CIBIL mobile app allows you to:
• Log in to your mobile’s CIBIL Dashboard with the same username and password that you use on your web application.
• Get one free CIBIL Score and Report, available once a year.
• Our Subscription services seamlessly enable you to avail CIBIL Score and Report along with a host of features that your mobile app comes equipped with:
• Unlimited access and daily refreshes to your CIBIL Score and Report
• CIBIL Score Simulator to evaluate various what-if scenarios and see how different actions can impact your current score
• CIBIL Alerts to get notifications for all the key changes in your credit profile
• Monitor your credit profile with a seamless snapshot of all enquiries and active loan accounts or credit cards
• Learn more about your CIBIL Score and Report, and its role in getting you access to credit

Personalized loan offers matched to your needs only at CIBIL Marketplace.
• We are a platform facilitating the loan transactions between the borrowers and the Banks/NBFCs.
• Consumers can choose from a wide range of personalized Loans & Credit Card offers from India’s top Banks (HDFC Bank, AXIS Bank, RBL Bank Limited, IndusInd Bank) and NBFCs (Bajaj Finance Limited, Fullerton India, Aditya Birla Finance Limited, IIFL Finance Limited, HDB Financial Services Limited, Home Credit India Pvt. Ltd.)
• Period for repayment: 3 to 90 months
• Annual Percentage Rate (APR) - (Interest Rate): 3% to 48%
• Processing Fee: 0.5% to 10% of loan amount charged by the lenders

Please Note:
• All loans are only available to Indian citizens within the territory of India
• Final loan approval is subject to the policy of the lender

Example:
• For loan amount of INR 100,000
• Tenure: 12 months
• Processing fee: 2% & interest 15%

Representative Calculation:
• For a loan amount of INR 100,000
• Processing fee is 2% amounting to INR 2,000.
• Actual loan disbursed will be INR 98,000 (Processing fee is deducted from the loan amount and disbursed)
• Total interest payable for 12 months (15%) is: INR 8,310.
• Total amount payable: INR 108,310

Download the app today!

This is achieved through a confluence of data and internet-based tools that provide consumers the most accessible, accurate credit information and promote financial literacy, inclusion and protection. We believe in the power of information to help individuals make better and smarter decisions so they can achieve their personal financial goals while contributing to the development of a stronger economy.

We call this Information for Good.

About TransUnion CIBIL – Consumer Interactive
Consumer Interactive is the direct-to-consumer division of TransUnion CIBIL, India’s largest credit information company with one of the country’s most comprehensive collections of consumer information. descriptionHtml:
Stay connected 24/7 to your CIBIL Score and Report.

Your CIBIL Score and Report provide you with a 360-degree comprehensive view of your credit profile to help you stay loan-ready. And while you may have accessed your CIBIL dashboard on your mobile phone or computer, our mobile app allows you to stay connected to your credit profile, even on the go.

MONITORING YOUR CREDIT PROFILE JUST GOT EASIER.

The CIBIL credit report app is your personal creditworthiness tracker, giving you 24/7 access to your credit profile and financial history at your fingertips. This useful credit monitoring tool ensures that you stay connected to your credit information, loans and accounts, credit exposure and more.

Equipped with a refreshed look and feel, the TransUnion CIBIL mobile app allows you to:

·       Get one free CIBIL Score and Report a year.
·       Our subscription services enable you to also seamlessly avail a host of features that your mobile app comes equipped with:
o   Unlimited access and daily refreshes to your CIBIL Score and Report
o   CIBIL Score Simulator to evaluate various what-if scenarios and see how different actions can impact your current score
o   CIBIL Alerts are your ultimate credit utilization tracker, sending you notifications for all the key changes in your credit profile
o   Keep track of your score over time with score history.
·       Monitor your credit profile and financial health with a one-glance snapshot of all enquiries and active loan accounts or credit cards
·       Learn more about your CIBIL Score and Report, and its role in getting you access to credit
